column3: This is a new attempt on this PR:\n\nhttps://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17166

ACK 6f68523\n\nJust see my nit about the white space. Have you looked if you can pack a little more into this PR? If you `grep` for other `http://` links that could be updated to `https://` that could turn up some other fixed to be included here.

ACK 6f6852335fc236dd6ec161162f49bfd813036acc - as mentioned in this [comment](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/17166#issuecomment-545906845), in future, there's no need to open a new PR instead than squashing. One of the requirements of contributing to Bitcoin Core is some basic `git` usage, and we have some documentation on that in our [CONTRIBUTING.md](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/b
@sandakersmann if you have git-related questions, feel free to jump on freenode #bitcoin-core-dev and ping me there (instagibbs)
Could also fix double white spaces between the sentences while you are at it :)
The white space hasn't changed with this PR, and doesn't really need fixing either. I'm just going to merge this, because it's already been bike-shed to death.
